pconn: 30-pin proprietary Zune connector, 3.5mm audio connector, internal 40-pin ZIF for HDD/SSD
othic: Focus Enhancements FS456LF; Freescale MC13783VK; KSC KS3021 Wi-Fi module soldered to logic board; Wolfson Microelectronics WM???? audio codec
notes: Internal 1.8" storage drive connected to the system via an internal 40-pin ZIF FPC.
insrc: CrazyblocksTechnologies Computer Laboratories (Memory IC, processor, storage connector, other ICs), Andrew "bunnie" Huang (Memory IC, processor, storage connector, other ICs) https://www.bunniestudios.com/blog/?p=131, iFixit Andrew Optimus Goldheart (Memory IC, processor, storage connector, other ICs) https://www.ifixit.com/Guide/Microsoft+Zune+30+GB+LCD+Replacement/1227, NXP/Freescale (more info on SoC) https://www.nxp.com/docs/en/fact-sheet/MC9328MX31FS.pdf [PDF].
